## skipCharsUtf8() function

Creates a Parser that skips the given number of characters.

This counts in unicode characters (code points), not UTF-16 code units.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function skipCharsUtf8(nCodepoints: number): Parser<void, ArrayLike<number>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  nCodepoints | number | number of characters to skip |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Parser](./prsc.parser.md)<!-- -->&lt;void, ArrayLike&lt;number&gt;&gt;
